content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: PP
      operator: exists
    - name: PC
      operator: not_exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000183
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when a PP dataset is present in study, but a PC dataset
  is not present in study.
Outcome:
  Message: PP dataset is present in  study, but PC dataset is not present in study.
Rule Type: Domain Presence Check
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0318
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Note, domain pairs have been modeled for microbiology
                  data (MB/MS domains) and PK data (PC/PP domains) to enable dataset-level
                  relationships to be described using RELREC.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: '1'
                Section: '2.6'
              - Cited Guidance: A findings domain that contains pharmacokinetic parameters
                  derived from pharmacokinetic concentration-time (PC) data.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: PP - Description/Overview
                Section: 6.3.5.6.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - PC
      - PP

json.Description: Raise an error when a PP dataset is present in study, but a PC dataset is not present in study.

Outcome.Message: PP dataset is present in  study, but PC dataset is not present in study.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Note, domain pairs have been modeled for microbiology data (MB/MS domains) and PK data (PC/PP domains) to enable dataset-level relationships to be described using RELREC.
A findings domain that contains pharmacokinetic parameters derived from pharmacokinetic concentration-time (PC) data.
